body_html: Yeah you're right, sorry. The test doesn't hurt being in there for world_size but run_test.sh should run fine as WORLD_SIZE is 2 in it for nccl (as you mentioned). I was manually setting world_size to 3 on a 2 GPU machine because I wasn't being careful and thought nccl test was also world size 3.

body: Yeah you're right, sorry. The test doesn't hurt being in there for world_size but run_test.sh should run fine as WORLD_SIZE is 2 in it for nccl (as you mentioned). I was manually setting world_size to 3 on a 2 GPU machine because I wasn't being careful and thought nccl test was also world size 3.
